spec_data.Name: perl-CGI-Application-Plugin-CAPTCHA
spec_data.Description:
CGI::Application::Plugin::CAPTCHA allows programmers to easily add and
verify CAPTCHAs in their CGI::Application-derived web applications.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:04:42 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Easily create, use, and verify CAPTCHAs in CGI::Application-based web apps
